Annotations.Annotation: Cube Schema for CCRS - Human Rights Profile

ExpressionView.SQL: select ISO2, REGION, NAME from BASE_COUNTRY, CATEGORY where BASE_COUNTRY.ISO2 = CATEGORY.COUNTRY AND DTYPE = 'CountryRegion' and REGION <> 'Uncategorized'
SELECT ID, LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='CountryIncomeStatus'
SELECT ID, LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='SecondaryCountryIncomeStatus'
SELECT ID, LABEL FROM CATEGORY WHERE DTYPE='UNHRTreatyBody'

select D.*, CP12.DESIGNATION, CP12.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN D.HAS_ENGAGED_DEVELOP_NATL_CAPACITY_TO_REPORT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_ENGAGED_DEVELOP_NATL_CAPACITY_TO_REPORT_COUNT, CASE WHEN D.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY FROM CP12UNHRTREATY_BODY D, CP12HUMAN_RIGHTS_PROFILE CP12, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1 WHERE CP12.DESIGNATION = CP1.DESIGNATION AND CP12.ENTITY_YEAR = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR AND CP12.ID = D.PARENT_ID AND CP12.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP12.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND CP12.DESIGNATION in (select iso2 from BASE_COUNTRY) AND CP12.designation in (select v.designation from v_cp_validated_designations v where v.entity_year = CP12.ENTITY_YEAR)

select D.*, CP12.DESIGNATION, CP12.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN D.UNCT_SUPPORTED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as UNCT_SUPPORTED_COUNT, CASE WHEN D.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOWUP_RECOMMENDATIONS_COUNT, CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY FROM CP12VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC D, CP12HUMAN_RIGHTS_PROFILE CP12, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1 WHERE CP12.DESIGNATION = CP1.DESIGNATION AND CP12.ENTITY_YEAR = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR AND CP12.ID = D.PARENT_ID AND CP12.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP12.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND CP12.DESIGNATION in (select iso2 from BASE_COUNTRY) AND CP12.designation in (select v.designation from v_cp_validated_designations v where v.entity_year = CP12.ENTITY_YEAR)

select cp12.ID, cp12.DESIGNATION, cp12.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ADVISOR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ADVISOR, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp12hranalysis.HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_DEVELOP_INPUTS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_DEVELOP_INPUTS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETYUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETYUPR, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTRECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTRECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATE_FOLLOW_UP_GOVERNMENT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTFACILITATE_FOLLOW_UP_GOVERNMENT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTDRAWN_ON_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_CIVIL_SOCIETY_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTDSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTDSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTPROVIDED_INPUTS_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTPROVIDED_INPUTS_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATED_GOLLOW_UP_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTFACILITATED_GOLLOW_UP_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES,
CASE WHEN cp12.WAS_COUNTRY_REVIEWED_BY_TREATY_BODY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as WAS_COUNTRY_REVIEWED_BY_TREATY_BODY, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENT_SPECIAL_PROCEDURES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTFACILITATED_FOLLOW_UP_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTFACILITATED_FOLLOW_UP_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMA_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMA_RIGHTS_INSTITUTION, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTIONUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_NATIONAL_HUMAN_RIGHTS_INSTITUTIONUPR, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUBMITTED_INPUTS_REPORTS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUBMITTED_INPUTS_REPORTS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENTUPR = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTSUPPORTED_GOVERNMENTUPR, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNCTENGAGE_WITH_GOVERNMEN = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNCTENGAGE_WITH_GOVERNMEN, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_TRAINING_ON_HUMAN_RIGHTS_APPROACH = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp12training.PART_OF_ROLLOUT_PROCESS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as PART_OF_ROLLOUT_PROCESS, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_HUMAN_RIGHTS_ANALYSIS = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp12hranalysis.HAS_ADDRESSEDHRISSUES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as HAS_ADDRESSEDHRISSUES, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_SUPPORTEDHRNATIONAL_PROGRAMMES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_SUPPORTEDHRNATIONAL_PROGRAMMES, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUPRPROCESS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUPRPROCESS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUPRPROCESS = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp12uprprocess.HAS_SUPPORTED_NATIONAL_REPORT_DEVELOPMENT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as HAS_SUPPORTED_NATIONAL_REPORT_DEVELOPMENT, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUPRPROCESS = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp12uprprocess.HASUNCTREPORTUPRSUBMITTED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as HASUNCTREPORTUPRSUBMITTED, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUPRPROCESS = TRUE THEN CASE WHEN cp12uprprocess.HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOUP_GOV_RECOMMENDATIONS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ELSE null END as HAS_FACILITATED_FOLLOUP_GOV_RECOMMENDATIONS, CASE WHEN cp12.HASUNHRTREATY_BODIES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASUNHRTREATY_BODIES, CASE WHEN cp12.HAS_RECEIVED_VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_RECEIVED_VISIT_OF_SPECIAL_PROCEDUREHRC, CASE WHEN cp12.HASHRI = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HASHRI, CASE WHEN cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY from CP12HUMAN_RIGHTS_PROFILE cp12, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE cp1, CP12TRAINING_ONHRAPPROACH cp12training, CP12HRANALYSIS cp12hranalysis, CP12UPRPROCESS cp12uprprocess WHERE cp12.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp12.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR AND cp12training.PARENT_ID = cp12.id AND cp12hranalysis.PARENT_ID = cp12.id AND cp12uprprocess.PARENT_ID = cp12.id AND cp12.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND cp12.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND cp12.DESIGNATION in (select iso2 from BASE_COUNTRY) and cp12.designation in (select v.designation from v_cp_validated_designations v where v.entity_year = cp12.ENTITY_YEAR)

Measure.name: hasUNCTDSupportedNationalHumanRightsInstitution
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT supported National Human Rights Institution interact with the Special Procedures?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTProvidedInputsSpecialProcedures
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT provided inputs to the visit of the Special Procedures?'

Measure.name: hasUNCTFacilitatedGollowUpSpecialProcedures
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT facilitated follow up of the Special Procedures recommendations by the Government?'

Measure.name: HAS_STRATEGY_DEVELOPED_ADDRESSHR
Measure.caption: Count of 'Has a strategy been developed to address the human rights issues identified in the analysis?'
